title: Drawing, "Palazzo dei Conservatori,", 1575–1600
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk
Support: White laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at center: il profilo che sigira atorno/ groseza di fatto/ profilo del fronte stizio
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Palazzo dei Conservatori,", 1575–1600.
1575–1600. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk
Support: White laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1037.
